statements: SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, application_date, approval_status, permit_details FROM environmental_permits;
SELECT applicant_name, permit_id, application_date, permit_details, approval_status FROM environmental_permits;
SELECT * FROM environmental_permits;
SELECT approval_status, permit_details, applicant_name, application_date, permit_id FROM environmental_permits;
SELECT application_date, permit_id, applicant_name, permit_details, approval_status FROM environmental_permits;
SELECT * FROM environmental_permits WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM environmental_permits WHERE applicant_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY permit_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_permits WHERE DATE_PART('year', application_date) = 2021 AND LENGTH(permit_details) > 100;
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, approval_status FROM environmental_permits WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe' OR applicant_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY permit_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT approval_status) AS num_approval_statuses, DATE_TRUNC('month', application_date) AS month FROM environmental_permits GROUP BY month ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_permit_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type FROM environmental_permit_applications WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, permit_type FROM environmental_permit_applications ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM permit_approvals WHERE approval_status = 'approved';

SELECT applicant_name, application_date, approval_date FROM environmental_permit_applications JOIN permit_approvals ON environmental_permit_applications.application_id = permit_approvals.application_id;
SELECT * FROM environmental_permit_applications WHERE application_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type FROM environmental_permit_applications WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, permit_type, application_date FROM environmental_permit_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC

SELECT environmental_permit_applications.applicant_name, permit_approvals.approval_date FROM environmental_permit_applications JOIN permit_approvals ON environmental_permit_applications.application_id = permit_approvals.application_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM environmental_permit_applications WHERE permit_type = 'Construction'
SELECT * FROM environmental_permit_applications;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM environmental_permit_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM permit_approval WHERE issued_by = 'Company ABC';
SELECT application_id, approval_date FROM permit_approval WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT application_type FROM environmental_permit_applications WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM environmental_permit_applications WHERE application_type='Renewal';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM environmental_permit_applications WHERE approval_status=true ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT pa.applicant_name, pc.condition_description FROM environmental_permit_applications pa JOIN permit_approval pa ON pa.application_id = pa1.application_id JOIN permit_conditions pc ON pa1.approval_id = pc.approval_id WHERE pc.condition_description LIKE '%monitoring%';

SELECT pa.applicant_name, pa.application_date, pc.condition_description FROM environmental_permit_applications pa JOIN permit_approval pa1 ON pa.application_id = pa1.application_id JOIN permit_conditions pc ON pa1.approval_id = pc.approval_id WHERE pa.applicant_name='John Doe' AND pa1.issued_by='Department of Environment';

SELECT pa.applicant_name, pa.application_date, pa1.approval_date, pc.condition_description FROM environmental_permit_applications pa JOIN permit_approval pa1 ON pa.application_id = pa1.application_id JOIN permit_conditions pc ON pa1.approval_id = pc.approval_id WHERE pa.application_date >= '2021-01-01' AND pc.condition_description != '';
SELECT * FROM permit_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM permit_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM permit_applications WHERE application_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM permit_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM permit_documents WHERE document_type='Permit Letter';
SELECT * FROM permit_applications WHERE application_status='Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM permit_applications WHERE permit_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM permit_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_permits FROM permit_approvals WHERE approval_status='Approved';

SELECT applicant_name, application_date, location_address FROM permit_applications JOIN permit_locations ON permit_applications.permit_id = permit_locations.permit_id WHERE permit_locations.location_name LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM permit_applications;
SELECT * FROM permit_approvals WHERE approval_id = 1;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM permit_applications WHERE application_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT detail_description FROM permit_details WHERE application_id = 3 ORDER BY detail_id DESC;
SELECT approval_id, approval_date, approved_by FROM permit_approvals WHERE approved_by LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM permit_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date, permit_type FROM permit_applications WHERE permit_type = 'Construction' ORDER BY application_date ASC;

SELECT p.applicant_name, pa.approval_date, pd.detail_description FROM permit_applications p INNER JOIN permit_approvals pa ON p.application_id = pa.application_id INNER JOIN permit_details pd ON p.application_id = pd.application_id;
SELECT pl.location_name, pl.region, ps.status FROM permit_locations pl LEFT JOIN permit_status ps ON pl.location_id = ps.application_id WHERE ps.status = 'Approved';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_permits, permit_type FROM permit_applications GROUP BY permit_type HAVING total_permits > 3 ORDER BY total_permits DESC;
